snippet: Two men and a woman were arrested on Saturday in connection with a museum theft of two Chinese artifacts with a combined estimated worth of $3.2 million, The Associated Press reported.
abstract: Two men and a woman are arrested in connection with a theft of two Chinese artifacts with a combined estimated worth of $3.2 million from the Oriental Museum at Durham University in England.
lead_paragraph: Two men and a woman were arrested on Saturday in connection with a museum theft of two Chinese artifacts with a combined estimated worth of $3.2 million, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Arrests in Case of Chinese Artifacts
headline.print_headline: Arrests in Case Of Chinese Artifacts
